Version 11.0 Release Notes
Admin Section

12 min
login using google authentication login using google authentication from v11 0, you can now log into your admin accounts via google two factor authenticator to start the configuration, first of all, enable the " enable two factor authentication (2fa) module for admin " setting from the site settings as soon as you enable the setting, the option to configure 2fa will appear under the account details tab click on the "configure 2fa" this will redirect the admin to a new page for further configuration first of all, enable the toggle for two factor authentication from your mobile device, open google authenticator and then scan this qr code one 6 digit code will appear in the authenticator screen, enter that code in the space provided for the security code once done with all the details, click on the save the below screen will appear after the configuration the "remove 2fa" button will appear after the configuration for the admin to remove the configuration and re perform the configuration in case the device is lost or not accessible after the configuration, the admin needs to enter the code for login to their admin accounts security against login password guessing attack security against login password guessing attack to prevent password guessing attacks (brute force attacks), we are bringing a setting in the site variable for limiting the number of login attempts this will apply to the admin as well as the customer login screen after some nth failed login attempts as per configuration, the system will display a warning message when the user reaches the maximum number of failed login attempts, the user and ip address will be temporarily blocked and the same is conveyed to the user in the login screen order notifications for all types of admin accounts order notifications for all types of admin accounts to enable admins other than the super admin such as printer, branches, and workflow admins to receive and manage their respective orders, in this version, an “email notification” setting will be added to the edit screen of printer, branch, and workflow admin modules once enabled, the respective admins will receive all the notifications related to the orders to their configured email ids multiple shipping types for “shipping cost by order subtotal” shipping method multiple shipping types for “shipping cost by order subtotal” shipping method the shipping type functionality will be expanded for the shipping cost by order subtotal in v11 0 for ease of use, we have introduced the shipping types and shipping prices icons the admin will be able to add multiple shipping types as per their requirements and configure the price by individual shipping type minor enhancements minor enhancements storage and display of image dimensions storage and display of image dimensions in this release, the dimensions of images uploaded from the admin panel will be stored and will be used on the front store to overcome the cls issue as the image dimensions will be stored automatically, the ‘image box height’ setting from the web optimization section will be removed audit logs cannot be deleted audit logs cannot be deleted to place restrictions on the deletion of audit logs, the delete button is removed from the audit log page new filters in order detail reports new filters in order detail reports in order detail reports, a new dropdown is introduced with order date and payment date options this will allow the admin to filter the orders report by specific ordered date or payment date image and rating support in testimonials image and rating support in testimonials you can now add images and ratings to the testimonials to increase the credibility of any review and trust in your audience for this, the testimonial image and testimonial rating fields have been introduced on the add testimonial screen automated web optimization automated web optimization we have automated the web optimization feature in version 11 0 now, when the web optimization is enabled and the admin uploads images, those will get automatically optimized and start displaying on the front store without the admin clicking on the "optimize" button manually hot folder remote test connection hot folder remote test connection from v11 0 onwards, the admin can test the connections while setting up any of the cloud storage or hot folders to ensure that the connection and locations entered are valid using the "test connection" button weight based shipping method can now be duplicated weight based shipping method can now be duplicated the weight based shipping method can now be duplicated and configured to be used as a separate shipping method you just need to contact the technical team for the duplication of this method
